list.name: Status
list.query: select title,tags,text from annotations where $timeFilter and cluster = 'ceph'

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "ceph_health" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$mon/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "ceph_quorum_count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "ceph_monitor_count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "ceph_objects_count" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "ceph_pg_count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "ceph_pool_total_percent_free" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ceph_pool_total_bytes_used" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ceph_pool_total_bytes_free" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT max("value") FROM "ceph_pg_state_count" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster/ AND "hostname" =~ /$mon/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT last("value") FROM "ceph_pool_count" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster/ AND "hostname" =~ /$mon/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ceph_pool_bytes_used" WHERE "pool" =~ /$pool/ AND "cluster" =~ /$cluster/ AND "hostname" =~ /$mon/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ceph_pool_bytes_free" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster/ AND "hostname" =~ /$mon/ AND "cluster" =~ /$cluster/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ceph_pool_objects" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster/ AND "hostname" =~ /$mon/ AND "pool" =~ /$pool/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT last("value") FROM "ceph_pool_objects" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster/ AND "hostname" =~ /$mon/ AND "pool" =~ /$pool/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ceph_pool_bytes_rate_rx" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster/ AND "hostname" =~ /$mon/ AND "pool" =~ /$pool/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ceph_pool_bytes_rate_tx" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster/ AND "hostname" =~ /$mon/ AND "pool" =~ /$pool/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT max("value") FROM "ceph_pool_ops_rate" WHERE "pool" =~ /$pool/ AND "cluster" =~ /$cluster/ AND "hostname" =~ /$mon/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ceph_pool_size" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster/ AND "hostname" =~ /$mon/ AND "pool" =~ /$pool/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "ceph_pool_pg_num" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster/ AND "hostname" =~ /$mon/ AND "pool" =~ /$pool/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT last("value") FROM "ceph_osd_count_up" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster/ AND "hostname" =~ /$mon/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "ceph_osd_count_down" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster/ AND "hostname" =~ /$mon/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ceph_osd_count_up" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster/ AND "hostname" =~ /$mon/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ceph_osd_count_down" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster/ AND "hostname" =~ /$mon/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ceph_osd_count_in" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster/ AND "hostname" =~ /$mon/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ceph_osd_count_out" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster/ AND "hostname" =~ /$mon/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ceph_osd_space_used" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster/ AND "hostname" =~ /$mon/ AND "osd" =~ /$osd/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ceph_osd_space_total" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster/ AND "hostname" =~ /$mon/ AND "osd" =~ /$osd/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ceph_osd_latency_appply" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster/ AND "hostname" =~ /$mon/ AND "osd" =~ /$osd/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ceph_osd_latency_commit" WHERE "cluster" =~ /$cluster/ AND "hostname" =~ /$mon/ AND "osd" =~ /$osd/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)

list.name: mon
list.query: show tag values from ceph_health with key = hostname

list.name: cluster
list.query: show tag values from ceph_health with key = cluster

list.name: pool
list.query: show tag values from ceph_pool_size with key = pool

list.name: osd
list.query: show tag values from ceph_osd_space_total with key = osd
